list.title: Zomato Clone
list.subtitle: August 2023 • Practice Project
list.description: Zomato is an online food service platform where users can search and discover restaurants. This clone project was built to test my React frontend skills. Includes sliders, responsive design, skeleton loading, and more.

list.title: Vox Dashboard
list.subtitle: September 2023 • Founder & Developer
list.description: Vox is the cinema arm of Majid Al Futtaim, the leading shopping malls, communities, retail and leisure pioneer across the Middle East, Africa and Central Asia.

list.title: Hasanati
list.subtitle: June 2023 • Founder & Developer
list.description: Hasanati is a habit tracker web app for Muslims. It allows users to track their progress in terms of Prayer, Quran, and more. The app offers stunning UI&UX designs and powerful API integrations.
